headline.title:
Hi, 
my name is Alex
headline.subtitle: Aspiring ML Engineer
headline.content:
I'm a recent graduate from UCL studying AI in Biomedicine and Healthcare. 

I have experience in software development & DevOps as well.

ai_content: Model refinement and analysis for MRI data
swe_devops_content: Set up working scripts for genomic analysis

about.title: UCL Graduate/Research Associate @ NUS
about.intro:
I'm an aspiring ML engineer currently working as a research associate in microbiome research. I recently graduated from UCL with a Master's Degree in AI, which gave me plenty of experience using and finetuning different AI models. 
 
 My current interest is watching game development videos by Thor from PirateSoftware, maybe eventually coding my own game myself?
